title: Diagnose GPS Timing Failure on Cell Site
description: A cell site reports a 'Loss of Sync' alarm, indicating a problem with its GPS timing source.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the 'Loss of Sync' alarm for the specific cell site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the site and alarm.

tasks.description: Remotely check the status of the GPS receiver at the site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the GPS receiver is not tracking any satellites.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for a field technician to inspect the GPS antenna and cabling.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket with specific instructions to check the physical GPS equipment.
